code: public static HazelcastInstance newInstance() {     Config cfg = new XmlConfigBuilder().build().     // hazelcast.version.check.enabled is deprecated     cfg.setProperty("hazelcast.phone.home.enabled", System.getProperty("hazelcast.phone.home.enabled", "false")).     cfg.setProperty("hazelcast.logging.type", System.getProperty("hazelcast.logging.type", "slf4j")).     return newInstance(cfg). }
public static HazelcastInstance newInstance(Config cfg) {     return Hazelcast.newHazelcastInstance(cfg). }
